[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/shops/inherit/bank_base.c

This is the bank inheritable. It handles all the bank transactions and other such exciting stuff. This is a basic bank bit, does not control any extra tricky bits of bank work.

Written by Pinkfish

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/move_failures.h, /include/shops/bank.h and /include/money.h
